content.body:
annevk: Thanks for the review! I wonder if I should remove "The user agent may ignore the node for the purposes of text search
   (commonly known as "find in page")." altogether. No implementation currently does this (unless aria-hidden nodes are ignored in some contexts).

content.body: ntim: I don't have a strong opinion, how do UAs deal with it then? Wouldn't searching result in selection?

content.body: Ah yeah, for some reason I thought you could copy-and-paste the currently highlighted one, but that's not a thing

content.body: Still might be frustrating if you can search and find, but not select and copy
